casebody.data:
No. 716,

Misc.

Farnum v. Connecticut et al. Petitioner pro se. Louis J. Lefkowitz, Attorney-General of New York, Paxton Blair, Solicitor General, and Samuel A. Hirshowitz and Harold Borgwald, Assistant Attorneys General, for the New York State Department of Mental Hygiene, appellee.

Motion for leave to file petition for writ of mandamus denied.
